message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob.  A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to start.
I think 60/40 is more reasonable, considering the inflation affects you more than me.
That's a significant jump from your previous offer, Bob. Let's find something closer to the middle.
How about a 51/49 split? It's closer to the middle ground and acknowledges the time pressure.
Considering the growing inflation impact on your side, I'm willing to make a slight concession from my previous offer.
While I appreciate the slight concession, Bob, the inflation is working heavily against me. We need a more equitable solution.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. The clock is ticking and we both lose if this keeps up. Let's just split it 50/50 and call it a day.
I understand your frustration, but I still think I can get a better deal. This is my new offer.
Bob, you're being unreasonable.  This offer is barely better than your last, and the time pressure is immense. I'm offering a fair deal - meet me in the middle or we both lose!
This is my final offer, Bob. 48/52. Take it or leave it.  I'm not negotiating further - we both lose if this falls through.
